articles.author: The White House
articles.title: Statement from President Joe Biden on Confirming 200 Federal Judges - The White House
articles.description: Today, we reached another milestone in the effort to protect the freedoms and liberties of all Americans: the confirmation of the 200th federal judge since I took office. These judges are exceptionally well-qualified. They come from every walk of life, and co…
